text: â€œNdipo (akumbutse za) tsiku lomwe tidzautsa mboni mu mtundu uliwonse zochokera mwa iwo omwe adzawachitira umboni (pa zomwe zinkachitika ndi iwo); ndipo tidzakubweretsa iwe kukhala mboni pa awa (anthu ako); ndiponso takuvumbulutsira buku ili lomwe likufotokoza za chinthu chilichonse lomwenso ndi chiongoko ndi mtendere ndiponso ndinkhani yosangalatsa kwa ogonjera (Allah)
